```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data Import: CSVs

Let's import data using the `readr` package.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
view(litters_df)
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```



`read_csv` options..

```{r, eval = FALSE}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("","NA",999,88, skip=2)
```
